title: Giro d’Italia Stage 20: Tadej Pogačar Reigns Supreme, Secures Pink Jersey with Sledgehammer Monte Grappa Attack
content:
Pogačar all but seals 10-minute overall victory with solo raid, Daniel Martínez secures breakout second-place overall ahead of Geraint Thomas.
